The British School of Guangzhou Part of The British Schools Group
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
I would like to cordially invite you to the BSG Secondary Christmas Celebration. This event will take place in the Nanhu Theatre on Tuesday 11th December and features talented students from years 7-9, the Korean Ensemble, the Secondary Choir and some communal carol singing. Doors will open at 6.30pm and there will be warming mulled wine and mince pies for all!
Please click the link for the flyer of Concert.
Regards,
Naomi Rowan Head of Secondary Music and Performing Arts The British School of Guangzhou World Class Education
